raw_comment:
1. What I notice is that the percentages of the Women's National Basketball Association and National Basketball Association of players of color are the same. 
2. What I wonder about these graphs is why does each of the sports have a different percentage increase to their players of color. 
3. The impact this has on me and my community is that there are more people like me and my community joining sports and being able to play in these professional leagues. I feel like no matter what color or race you are you can be successful to do what you want to do, and these graphs shows that more people of color are playing more. 
4. The interesting percentages of professional leagues of color.
ace_sentences: The percentage of players of color in the Women's National Basketball Association is the same as the percentage of players of color in the National Basketball Association.
Each sport has a different percentage increase of players of color.
I wonder why each sport has a different percentage increase of players of color.
This situation has an impact on me and my community.
More people like me join sports.
More people like my community join sports.
These people can play in professional leagues.
A person can be successful in doing what the person wants to do.
This is true no matter what color the person has.
This is true no matter what race the person has.
More people of color play in professional leagues.
The headline is: The interesting percentages of players of color in professional leagues.
